channel.title: Mobile hot spot and whonix
channel.description: So how does that work? If I create a hotspot via public wi-fi or via my own 3g network and open whonix on a different device - what would that mean in terms of security? What other factors come in play if any? I can see how this can be off-topic in a way, sorry.

item.title: Mobile hot spot and whonix
item.dc:creator: Ego
item.description:
Good day,

All traffic will still go through Tor, regardless of the network used.

Have a nice day,

Ego

Read full topic
